name: @maptiler/3d
description: Add 3D things to your map, plugin for MapTiler SDK
author: MapTiler Team

scripts.doc: rm -rf docs/* && typedoc --entryPoints src/index.ts --out docs && cp -r images docs/
scripts.make: npm run biome:fix && npm run build
scripts.build: npm run build-es; npm run build-umd
scripts.build-dev: NODE_ENV=development npm run build-es; NODE_ENV=development npm run build-umd
scripts.e2e:ci: concurrently --kill-others --success first "tsc --project ./e2e && NODE_ENV=production vite -c vite.config-e2e.ts" "npx playwright test --config=playwright.config.ts"
scripts.e2e:ci-update: concurrently --kill-others --success first "tsc --project ./e2e && NODE_ENV=production vite -c vite.config-e2e.ts" "npx playwright test --config=playwright.config.ts -u"
